labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Voice transmission will continue after push to talk is released.
data.expected_result: Voice tranmission will cease once the push to talk is released
data.short_description: Push to talk remains open when desktop is locked.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have push to talk enabled (In my case left ctrl) - Lock the PC using Windows + L - Press the push to talk key and say something - Release the push to talk key
